entry.tran: 俄罗斯的;俄罗斯人的;俄语的;俄罗斯文化的
entry.def: Russian means belonging or relating to Russia, or to its people, language, or culture.
A Russian is a Russian citizen, or a person of Russian origin.

example.ex: Three-quarters of Russians live in cities.
example.tran: 四分之三的俄罗斯人住在城市里。

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Russia
2. the Slavic language that is the official language of Russia
1. of or pertaining to or characteristic of Russia or its people or culture or language;

means.word_mean: 俄国的;俄罗斯的；俄语的

sentences.en: He drove us right up to the Russian border.
sentences.cn: 他开车一直把我们送到俄罗斯边境。

sentences.en: He quickly interpreted to us what the Russian was saying.
sentences.cn: 他很快把那个俄国人所说的话翻译给我们听。

sentences.en: He was jabbering away in Russian.
sentences.cn: 他叽里咕噜地说着俄语。

sentences.en: He made a diligent attempt to learn Russian.
At the age of sixty he took up the study of Russian.
sentences.cn: 在60岁时他开始学习俄语。

sentences.en: He both speaks and writes Russian.
